lead_paragraph: At South Plaquemines High, created after Hurricane Katrina from the remains of three Louisiana school districts, students are finally starting to feel at home.
snippet: At South Plaquemines High, created after Hurricane Katrina from the remains of three Louisiana school districts, students are finally starting to feel at home.
